name: SK ID Solutions
goal: Me oleme usaldusteenuste pakkuja vastavalt EU regulatsioonidele. Meie eesmärk on EU ühtsel digitaalteenuste turul teenuseid pakkuda.
euInitiatives: We are interested in eIDAS, PSDII and Cyber Security Package. Change of ENISA role will be intresting in the context of the new package and the EC norms for eIDAS implementation still continues as focus for us
